content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg, let me first emphasize that finding an optimal rental price for me is crucial. Now, as we begin discussing the price, please consider my opening bid at a significantly higher figure than what you may expect to pay, say 1500 Euros per month. I'm confident this exceptional location and apartment will still be well within your range despite this initial proposal. However, if this figure doesn't align with your budget, do inform me, and I'll be ready to consider other options. But remember, my goal is to secure the highest possible rental price for this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible as stated earlier.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
